overview: It never pays to fuck your boss off, but when it comes to fucking the boss ... well, that’s a whole different story – as this gang of horny twinks discover time and time again! Fact is, if you’re new to the workplace there’s no better way to get ahead than to give head – or even simply to part your legs and take one for the team! Kai Alexander, Billy Rubens and Jordan Jacobs give a whole new dimension to workplace action, as 9 to 5 drudgery turns into a cock-straining, ass-stretching, ball-busting blast. Prepare to clock on and cream your pants!
title: Boss Vs Twink
